segments.text: This kitchen disaster makes me so uneasy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is full to the brim, water cascading over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The mom is drying dishes right there, oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting wet from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are raiding the cookie jar without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's perched precariously on that two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's leaning back, ready to topple.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, hand raised high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If they fall into the puddle, it'll be a big slip-up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a tidy garden, totally contrasting this mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for the mom; she'll be upset when she sees.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies are tempting, I get why they're doing it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the risks are too high for some treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Please, let everything turn out okay.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stacked bowls might topple too if there's chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
